00042 BdkPdfDKDalitz::BdkPdfDKDalitz(const char * theName, const char * theDesc,
00043                                RooAbsReal & m12, RooAbsReal & m13,
00044                                BdkDalitzBase::Flavor flavor,
00045                                BdkPdfDKDalitz::COORD coord,

00047                                BdkAbsDDalitzAmp * externalAmp,

00065 // initializer:  
00066 void BdkPdfDKDalitz::init(const char * theName, const char * theDesc,
00067                           RooAbsReal & m12, RooAbsReal & m13,
00068                           BdkDalitzBase::Flavor flavor,
00069                           BdkPdfDKDalitz::COORD coord,
00070                           RooCategory* blindMode,
00071                           BdkAbsDDalitzAmp * externalAmp,
00072                           BdkDalitz::Mode DdecMode,
00073                           BdkAbsDDalitzAmp * externalAmpBar) 
00074 {
00075   // base class initialization:
00076   BdkPdfDalitzBase::init(theName, theDesc, m12, m13, flavor, DdecMode);
00077 
00078   _amp = externalAmp;
00079   _ampBar = externalAmpBar;
00080   _blindMode = blindMode;
00081 
00082   if (_ampBar) _deltaD = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName()) + ".deltaD",
00083                                         TString(GetTitle()) + ".deltaD",
00084                                         0);
00085   
00086   // Need to initialize x0/y0 after init() manually
00087   // because dalitzAmp is not available at this point yet
00088   if (coord==BdkPdfDKDalitz::POLAR) usePolar(0,0);
00089   else useCartesian();
00090 }

00092 
00093 // Use cartesian coordiantes
00094 void BdkPdfDKDalitz::useCartesian()
00095 {
00096   _coord = CART;
00097 
00098   Double_t x = 0.1;
00099   Double_t y = 0.1;
00100 
00101   // Save a pointer to dalitzAmp
00102   // This is needed in createPdf to not duplicate BdkAbsDDalitzAmp
00103   if (_thePdf) _amp = ((BdkDKDalitz*)_thePdf)->dalitzAmp();
00104 
00105   // If we are coming from polar coordinates we can use 
00106   // the old values as initial values.
00107   if (_x!=0) x = _x->getVal();
00108   if (_y!=0) y = _y->getVal();
00109     
00110   delete _x;
00111   delete _y;
00112   // Create the RRV's:
00113   _x = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName()) + ".x",
00114                       TString(GetTitle()) + " x",
00115                       x);
00116   ((RooRealVar*)_x)->setConstant(kFALSE);
00117   ((RooRealVar*)_x)->setError(0.005);
00118   
00119   _y = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName()) + ".y",
00120                       TString(GetTitle()) + " y",
00121                       y);
00122   ((RooRealVar*)_y)->setConstant(kFALSE);
00123   ((RooRealVar*)_y)->setError(0.005);   
00124 
00125   // Delete polar coordinates
00126   delete _rho; _rho = 0;
00127   delete _theta; _theta = 0;
00128   delete _x0; _x0 = 0;
00129   delete _y0; _y0 = 0;
00130 
00131   setupBlinding();
00132   setIsValid(kFALSE);
00133 }
00134 
00135 
00136 // Use polar coordinates with origin at minimum of yield
00137 void BdkPdfDKDalitz::usePolar()
00138 {
00139   Double_t x0 = 0;
00140   Double_t y0 = 0;
00141   
00142   if (_thePdf) {
00143     x0 = pdfType()->dalitzAmp()->x0();    
00144     y0 = pdfType()->dalitzAmp()->y0();
00145 
00146     cout << GetName() << ": Using polar coordinates with origin at x0 = "<<x0
00147        << ", y0 = "<<y0 << endl;
00148   }
00149 
00150   usePolar(x0, y0);
00151 }
00152 
00153 // Use polar coordinates with origin at (x0,y0)
00154 void BdkPdfDKDalitz::usePolar(Double_t x0, Double_t y0)
00155 {
00156   _coord = POLAR;
00157 
00158   // Save a pointer to dalitzAmp
00159   // This is needed in createPdf to not duplicate BdkAbsDDalitzAmp
00160   if (_thePdf) _amp = ((BdkDKDalitz*)_thePdf)->dalitzAmp();
00161 
00162   // Center of the polar coordinates
00163   _x0 = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName()) + ".x0",
00164                        TString(GetTitle()) + " x0",
00165                        x0);
00166 
00167   _y0 = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName()) + ".y0",
00168                        TString(GetTitle()) + " y0",
00169                        y0);
00170 
00171   // Polar coordinates
00172   _rho = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName()) + ".rho",
00173                         TString(GetTitle()) + " rho",
00174                         0.1, 0, RooNumber::infinity);
00175 
00176   _theta = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName()) + ".theta",
00177                           TString(GetTitle()) + " theta",
00178                           0.1, 0, 360);
00179 
00180   // Initialize polar coordinates from cartesian coordinates
00181   if (_x!=0 && _y!=0) {
00182     Double_t dx = _x->getVal() - x0;
00183     Double_t dy = _y->getVal() - y0;
00184     ((RooRealVar*)_rho)->setVal(sqrt(dx*dx + dy*dy));
00185     Double_t theta = atan2(dy,dx);
00186     if (theta<0) theta += 2*TMath::Pi();
00187     ((RooRealVar*)_theta)->setVal(theta*TMath::RadToDeg());
00188   }
00189 
00190   delete _x;
00191   delete _y;
00192   _x = new RooFormulaVar(TString(GetName()) + ".x",
00193                          TString(GetTitle()) + " x",
00194                          "@0+@1*cos(@2*pi/180.0)", 
00195                          RooArgList(*_x0,*_rho,*_theta));
00196 
00197   _y = new RooFormulaVar(TString(GetName()) + ".y",
00198                          TString(GetTitle()) + " y",
00199                          "@0+@1*sin(@2*pi/180.0)", 
00200                          RooArgList(*_y0,*_rho,*_theta));
00201 
00202  
00203   setupBlinding();
00204   setIsValid(kFALSE);
00205 }
00206 
00207 void BdkPdfDKDalitz::recalcX0() {
00208   // Recalculate X0 after reading in new Dalitz shape parameters:
00209   dalitzAmp()->calDDbarNorm();
00210   
00211   _x0->setVal(pdfType()->dalitzAmp()->x0());
00212   
00213   cout << GetName() << ": Recalculated x0 = " << _x0->getVal() << endl;
00214 }
00215 
00216 void BdkPdfDKDalitz::setPolarCoords(double x, double y) {
00217   // Set the values of rho and theta from x and y:
00218   //  recalcX0();
00219 
00220   _rho->setVal(sqrt(sqr(x - _x0->getVal()) + sqr(y - _y0->getVal())));
00221 
00222   double thetaVal = atan2(y - _y0->getVal(), x - _x0->getVal()) / BdkAbsDDalitzAmp::DEGTORAD;
00223   if (thetaVal < 0) thetaVal += 360;
00224   if (thetaVal > 360) thetaVal -= 360;
00225   _theta->setVal(thetaVal);
00226 
00227   cout << GetName() << ": Setting polar coordinates rho="
00228        << _rho->getVal() << ", theta=" << _theta->getVal() 
00229        << " from x=" << x << ", y=" << y << endl;
00230 }
00231 
00232 // Set CP parameters (either cartesian or polar) from rB, gamma and delta
00233 // A phase flip gamma -> -gamma is done for D0
00234 void BdkPdfDKDalitz::setCPparams(Double_t rB, Double_t gamma, Double_t delta)
00235 {
00236   if (flavor()==BdkDalitz::D0) gamma *= (-1);
00237   
00238   cout << GetName() << ": Setting CP parameters from rB=" << rB
00239        << ", gamma=" << gamma << ", delta=" << delta << endl;
00240   
00241   Double_t x = rB*cos((delta+gamma)*BdkAbsDDalitzAmp::DEGTORAD);
00242   Double_t y = rB*sin((delta+gamma)*BdkAbsDDalitzAmp::DEGTORAD);
00243   
00244   if (_coord==POLAR) {
00245     setPolarCoords(x,y);
00246   }
00247   else {
00248     cout << GetName()
00249          << ": Setting cartesian coordinates x=" << x << ", y=" << y
00250          << endl;
00251     ((RooRealVar*)_x)->setVal(x);
00252     ((RooRealVar*)_y)->setVal(y);    
00253   }
00254 }
00255 
00256 
00257 void BdkPdfDKDalitz::setupBlinding()
00258 {
00259   if (_blindMode) {
00260     // Unblinded variables
00261     delete _xUnblind;
00262     delete _yUnblind;
00263 
00264     _xUnblind = new RooUnblindPrecision(TString(GetName())+".xUnblind",
00265                                         TString(GetTitle())+" x unblinded",
00266                                         "TheBlindingString",
00267                                         0, 0.1, *_x, *_blindMode); 
00268     
00269     _yUnblind = new RooUnblindPrecision(TString(GetName())+".yUnblind",
00270                                         TString(GetTitle())+" y unblinded",
00271                                         "TheBlindingString",
00272                                         0, 0.1, *_y, *_blindMode);
00273   }
00274 }

00276 
00277 // Build the PDF:
00278 void BdkPdfDKDalitz::createPdf()
00279 {
00280   RooAbsReal* x;
00281   RooAbsReal* y;
00282 
00283   if (_blindMode) {
00284     x = _xUnblind;
00285     y = _yUnblind;
00286   }
00287   else {
00288     x = _x;
00289     y = _y;
00290   }
00291 
00292   if (verbose().Contains("c")) {
00293     cout << GetName() << ".createPdf(): flavor = " << flavor()
00294          << ", DdecMode = " << getDdecMode()
00295          <<      endl;
00296   }
00297 
00298   RooAbsPdf * thePdf = 0;
00299   
00300   if (_ampBar==0) thePdf = new BdkDKDalitz(TString(GetName())+".pdf",
00301                                            TString(GetTitle())+" Pdf", 
00302                                            *_m12, *_m13, *x, *y,
00303                                            flavor(), getDdecMode(),
00304                                            _amp);
00305   
00306   else thePdf = new BdkDKNonCDalitz(TString(GetName())+".pdf",
00307                                     TString(GetTitle())+" Pdf", 
00308                                     *_m12, *_m13, *x, *y, *_deltaD,
00309                                     flavor(), getDdecMode(),
00310                                     _amp, _ampBar);
00311 
00312   // Save pointer to dalitzAmp for reuse on subsequent createPdf() calls
00313   _amp = ((BdkDKDalitz*)thePdf)->dalitzAmp();
00314 
00315   ((BdkDKDalitz*)thePdf)->setEfficiencyFunc(_effFunc);
00316 
00317   setPdf(*thePdf); 
00318   setIsValid(kTRUE);
00319 }
00320 
00321 
00322 //----------------------------------
00323 BdkAbsDDalitzAmp * BdkPdfDKDalitz::dalitzAmp() {
00324   BdkDKDalitz * thePdf = (BdkDKDalitz *)getPdf();
00325   return (thePdf ? thePdf->dalitzAmp() : 0);
00326 }
00327 
00328 //----------------------------------
00329 BdkAbsDDalitzAmp * BdkPdfDKDalitz::dalitzAmpBar() {
00330   return _ampBar;
00331 }

00334 //-------------------------------------
00335 // Send verbosity flag to dalitzAmp:
00336 void BdkPdfDKDalitz::setVerbose(const char * val) {
00337   BdkPdfAbsBase::setVerbose(val); // do base class action
00338   if (verbose().Contains("+")) {  // set to amp
00339     pdfType()->dalitzAmp()->setVerbose(val);
00340   }
00341 }
